The value of the 120,000 pieces in the Egyptian Museum in Cairo is inestimable, not only in scientific or financial terms, but because they represent the Egyptian people's cultural identity. Playing down the damage But the country's newly appointed minister of antiquities, well-known egyptologist Zahi Hawass , on Thursday played down accounts of the break-in at the Museum and warned against "rumours."

I've heard gunshots and struggles outside. All the men on our street are armed to protect their homes. Neither my husband nor other men here have slept. Also, there are prisoners on the loose which is a big issue. People have not been able to go out to work. The well-off are OK as they have stored food. But the poor are really suffering- they are starving. Mosa'ab Elshamy tweets: "Mixed feelings towards Arab League Colin Powell Secretary, Amr Moussa . For Philadelphia To Use On Michael Vick Franchise Tag Likely To Be Available For Philadelphia To Use On Michael Vick Philadelphia Inquirer- The Eagles should be free to use their franchise tag on Michael Vick , despite labor uncertainty. I expect the franchise tag to continue to operate as it has in prior seasons and clubs to be permitted to exercise their rights under the tag, Jeff Pash , the NFL's general counsel, said Thursday. The Eagles and Michael Vick have had casual discussions about such a deal, a source close to the situation said.
